author: Willy
content: Just wondering how much of it is for show. Supposedly the great russian military parades featured weapons made of plywood models.

author: DAVID RYE
content:
Re the PLA above – I’m told that Meteor should not be underestimated.

See – https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Meteor_(missile)?fbclid=IwAR0Z_oZHh_LDYz1sP1KtzNf2rwddXu1D3WvJA4LiHWKIug9fbEpG5GgW9RY
